law.catch_line: Non Exemption Of Applicable Provisions Of Chapter 111, 112 Or 176 T
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 216 effective November 4, 2012.] Nothing in this chapter shall exempt any person from any applicable provisions of chapter 111, 112 or 176T including, but not limited to, provisions relating to determination of need, licensure and regulation of hospitals and clinics and registration of health professionals.
